articles.title: Volkswagen says it's putting ChatGPT in its cars for “enriching conversations” - The Verge
articles.description: Volkswagen is putting ChatGPT into its cars starting in the second quarter of 2024. The feature is being considered for the US, but plans have yet to be finalized.

articles.title: Largest US banks set to log sharp rise in bad loans - Financial Times

articles.content:
